DOC.brief_summary: Several observational study evaluate comparative treatment cost associate agent , particularly within anti-TNF class , evaluate impact therapy compliance , persistence , treatment pattern patient report outcome , healthcare utilization cost , use provider database . This study design fill information gap .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Of RA Therapy Compliance On Patient-Reported Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Adults moderate severe RA currently use DMARD Psoriatic Arthritis ( PsA ) , Psoriasis ( PsO ) , SSystemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE ) , NonDisease modify antirheumatic disease ( nonDMARD ) use
